itemize:
\begin{itemize}
\item Null Energy Condition (NEC): $\rho + p \geq 0$. 
\item Weak Energy Condition (WEC): $\rho\geq 0$ and $\rho + p \geq 0$. 
\item Strong Energy Condition (SEC): $\rho + 3 p \geq 0$ and $\rho + p \geq 0$.
\item Dominant Energy Condition (DEC): $\rho\geq 0$ and $\rho \pm p \geq 0$.  
\
